description: TimeseriesComponent represents an element of a CompositeTimeseries.

properties.name: repetitions
properties.description: Specifies how often the timeseries that is referenced by the TimeseriesComponent should be iterated.

properties.name: additionalGap
properties.description: Specifies how much extra time is added after all repetitions as an additional gap.

properties.name: timeseries
properties.description: Relates a timeseries to the TimeseriesComponent.
